mapper.insert: insert into tbl_borrows (borrow_id, borrow_time, repay_time, renew, overdue, reader_id, book_state_id, fine) values (#{borrowId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{borrowTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{repayTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{renew,jdbcType=BIT}, #{overdue,jdbcType=BIT}, #{readerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bookStateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fine,jdbcType=REAL})
mapper.update: update tbl_borrows set borrow_time = #{borrowTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, repay_time = #{repayTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, renew = #{renew,jdbcType=BIT}, overdue = #{overdue,jdbcType=BIT}, reader_id = #{readerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, book_state_id = #{bookStateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fine = #{fine,jdbcType=REAL} where borrow_id = #{borrowId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select borrow_id, borrow_time, repay_time, renew, overdue, reader_id, book_state_id, fine from tbl_borrows where borrow_id = #{borrowId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select borrow_id, borrow_time, repay_time, renew, overdue, reader_id, book_state_id, fine from tbl_borrows
